author: Kāzarūnī, Muḥammad ibn Masʻūd, -1357
contents: 4. fol. 107b-108a: Kalimah-i shiṣt va yikum az Kitāb-i S̲amarah-i Baṭlimyūs dar buḥrān. In Arabic with Persian translation and commentary. The Arabic portion of the extract corresponds to kalimah 62 in Islamic Manuscripts, New Series no. 50, but the Persian translation and commentary is different.

5. fol. 108b-109a: Ḥāshiyat al-Khujandī ʻalá kalām al-Shaykh al-Raʼīs fī fasād al-shahwah. Likely an extract from al-Talwīḥ ilá asrār al-Tanqīh, a gloss on Ibn Jumayʻ's commentary on Avicenna's al-Qānūn fī al-ṭibb.
extent: 116 leaves : paper ; 216 x 151 mm. bound to 222 x 158 mm.
creator: Kāzarūnī, Muḥammad ibn Masʻūd, -1357
subject: Ptolemy, active 2nd century—Centiloquium. Arabic
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
